name: Nilee Games
tagline: Game Development and Technology Services Company
description:
Nilee Games consists of a talented team of qualified experts in game development. We create original IPs as well as new concepts for existing IPs with a focus on high production values and quality game development. We share long-term relationships with our clients and encourage a collaborative development process. Currently we focus on developing for iOS, Android, Windows mobile, Flash, Facebook, Tizen and html5 platforms. 
Nilee Games also extensively working on HTML5 Games and Applications which perfectly works on all the browsers of mobile, tablets, desktop and smart TV. Our high quality HTML5 games are licensed by leading HTML5 game publishers. Porting to native Android, iOS, Tizen and Windows mobile is not a big task for our highly experienced team and ported games performance are as good as native games with Ads and In App Purchase. 
OUR SERVICES : HTML5 Games Development, iPhone Game Development, iPad Game Development, Android Game Development, Windows Phone8 Game Development, Facebook Game Development, Smart TV App and Game Development, Game Porting, Mobile Application Development, Augmented Reality Apps, Simulation Games, Architectural Interactive Application.
